Module f22_hw06_comp310_f22_hw06_03
Package model.strategies.interact

Class GravitationStrategy

java.lang.Object
model.strategies.interact.GravitationStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IInteractStrategy<IBallCmd>
public class GravitationStrategy extends Object implements IInteractStrategy<IBallCmd>
A strategy that pulls a ball towards the current ball.
Author:
Phoebe Scaccia
